name: straightly
content:
straightly adverb
(DIRECTLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
directly, honestly, or clearly: She had never been afraid to look straightly at whatever fortune sent her. He decided to talk straightly to the Prince at the earliest opportunity.
More examplesFewer examplesShe looked him straightly between the eyes as she asked the question.He returned the stare very straightly. People love that I'm a fresh voice and that I'm speaking straightly and clearly.
